decision_conditions: Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the northern side elevation with no. 174 Headstone Lane of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p>NWA-23-018-LOCE – Existing Site Location and Block Plans; NWA-23-018-LOCP Rev A – Proposed Site Location and Block Plans (received 21.08.24); NWA-23-018-01 Rev A - Survey Plans &amp; Elevations; NWA-23-018-03 Rev A – Proposed Extension (received 21.08.24); Fire Safety - Reasonable Exemption Statement</p><p>All plans received 05.08.24 unless otherwise stated</p><div><br></div>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey front extension incorporating front porch, Single storey side to rear extension, (Demolition of rear extension, side canopy and shed) (AMENDED PLANS).
